name: Moisturizing Shower Gel
description:
You will fall in love with the quality of the bubbles and the lather this amazing Shower Gel creates, as well as how wonderfully soft it will make your skin feel. We know people are rather picky about how well a bubble bath and body wash performs, we are certain you will fall in love with this body wash and bubble bath.



Baby Powder 
Bite Me Sparkling citrus notes (orange and lime) blend with sweet cherries and greenery. An effervescent vanilla berry rounds out the drydown on this twilight type of scent. 
BrownSugar 
Bubbles- Smells A wild blend of strawberries and vanilla with soft violet and jasmine notes. 
Candy Coated- Apple, Pear, Melon, Vanilla, Musk 
Cantaloupe 
Cashmere- Blend of Cedarwood, Amber, Musk, vanilla 
Caramel Candy Apple… Aromatic Notes: Apple, Caramel, Cinnamon, Brown Sugar 
Chocolate 
Coconut Shea- delicate coconut blended with scattered tiny grains of sensual sandalwood and topped with rich, creamy shea butter. 
Cotton Blossom- Blend of Cotton Flowers and Mandarin Oranges 
Cucumber Melon-- Blend of Cucumber, Honeydew and Watermelon 
For ever sunshine- A sparkling blend of golden apricot, pink peonies and a hint of praline. 
Forever Young: Blend of Vanilla, Peach, Violet 
Honey almond-. Blend of Almond & Honey 
Him
In Love- Blend of Lemon Peel, Vanilla, Musk, Mandarin 
Innocent- Sparkling bubbles of crisp champagne are delightfully blended with tangy grapefruit, champagne grapes and deep plum 
Jaded Apple- Ruby Casis, Ripe Pineapple, Rose Blossoms, Dewy Fresh Air, Jasmine Petals, Green Leaves 
Japanese Cherry Blossom- Tender cherry blossom, sensual white lily and blushing violet petals blended with a hint of warm vanilla 
Juicy Kiss Mango, Strawberries, Grapefruit, Freesia, Amber, Tonka Bean 
Kiwi Strawberry 
Mango 
Moroccan Desert-.. Blend of Carnation, Sandalwood, and Musk 
Mr. Mr. Bergamot, Sandalwood, Musk 
Mr. Right 
Paradise Island-- tropical Passionfruit, Blooming Jasmine, Sugared Citrus, Exotic Florals 
Pearberry 
Pink Grape fruit- Smells like Pure Grapefruit 
Pixie- Frozen Mango, Pink Sugar, Raspberry Sorbet, Coconut 
Purple Rain- Blend of Summer Flowers 
Red Velvet 
Rose violet- Blend of Heather & Hyacinth 
Sandalwood-: Fragrant grains of sandalwood are polished with sweet vanilla and white musk. 
Seduction- Blend of Musk, Floral, Apple, Fresh Citrus 
Strawberry Crème- Strawberry and Vanilla Cream 
Summer Honey- Fresh Honey 
Vanilla Lavender 
Vanilla Noir.- Sexy Vanilla, Madagascar Musk 
Peppermint oil 
Vanilla CupCake

name: Body Balm 8oz
description:
Our exclusive Body Lotion formula is packed with powerful ingredients like Raw Shea butter and Sunflower Oil. The healing properties of Sunflower Oil were first discovered by Native Americans.  Sunflower Oil is rich in Vitamin E with is a great way to moisturize and regenerate skin cells. This lotion also contains Allantoin which has been proven to aid in healing wounds and sores. It can also help stimulate growth of healthy skin tissue. 
Comes Packaged in our signature Amber colored Containers. 

Baby Powder 
Bite Me Sparkling citrus notes (orange and lime) blend with sweet cherries and greenery. An effervescent vanilla berry rounds out the drydown on this twilight type of scent.

name: Body Butter
description:
This whipped Shea Body butter is made of high quality, natural ingredients. It's light and fluffy. A little goes a long way. Whipped Shea butter is a great moisturizer for your skin. Scent descriptions Below...


Ingredients: Shea butter raw unrefined (Yellow and Ivory),Cocoa Butter, Mango Butter, Olive Oil, Coconut oil, Sweet almond oil, Avocado oil, Vitamin E, and Grape seed oil,
